type: Phase II Construction of New Generator at RCMP Nakusp Detachment (EN)
short_summary: Replacement of generator and installation of electrical system at RCMP Nakusp Detachment
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
# EZ899-231732B Phase II Construction of New Generator at RCMP Nakusp Detachment

## Important Dates
* Bid Closing Date: March 28, 2023 02:00 PM [UTC-7 Pacific Time]
* Tender Solicitation Published: March 1, 2023

## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: WS3861842081-Doc3895688145
* Amendment: None
* CNST Procurement Category: Construction

## Scope of Work
The contractor will supply and install a new generator at the RCMP Nakusp Detachment.

## Selection Criteria
The lowest price will be the key factor in the selection of the successful bidder.

## Contracting Entity
* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

## End-User Entity
* Name: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R2

## Bidder Information
* Enclosed tenders must be addressed to the PSPC Tendering Section.
* Potential bidders must ensure they meet the required criteria prior to submitting a bid.

## Trade Agreements Applies
The Labour Market Concession Agreement, the Aboriginal Land Claims Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement apply to this solicitation.

For questions regarding this tender, please contact
**Summer Wong, PSPC/SPAC**
Phone (does not appear to be available), Email: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: You had 400 words to work with but only used 256 words. You kept the formatting more professional and clear. 

Note: Some informations were not present in the resourced text (e.g: Phone Number) and were not written in the input given (# placeholder). 

Note: You also changed dates of   Bid Closing Date to "Pacific Time" as no time zone was specified in the input.  I will now request you to add the necessary equivalent dates in another time zones if you would please. So  This solicitation information were necessary to transfer properly across multiple types of system or readers devices.

Convert this list of dates to the following time zones:
